title: Whisper to a Scream
description: A prostitute who can’t afford to love. An angel who can’t afford not to. A tragic love story.Willow knows well the wicked lure of temptation. An angel with an important job to do, he has been consistent in his resistance. Until now. A chance meeting with Christina puts his strength to the test. It’s dangerous to love a human. It is forbidden. Willow must decide if it’s worth the risk and how much he’s willing to lose.Note: Willow is a character from the Alexa O’Brien Huntress series. This novella is a series spin off story that does stand alone.
author: Trina M. Lee
